title: When I try to voice to text "comma," "question mark," etc. it types the word in brackets Ex: {comma}
content: When I try to voice to text "comma," "question mark," etc. it types the word in brackets Ex: {comma} instead. It worked perfectly yesterday, putting in the actual punctuation, but today it's doing this. Was there an update that changed this? And how do I change it back to typing in the actual punctuation marks? I'm using Android version 11. Let me know if you need any further info?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
